mapper.insert: insert into pet_mypet(pname, age, birth, gender, photo, owner, species ,type) values(#{name}, #{age}, #{birthDay}, #{gender}, #{photo}, #{owner.no}, #{species}, #{type.no})
mapper.select: select p.pno, p.pname, p.age, p.birth, p.gender, p.photo, m.mno as owner_no, m.name as owner_name, t.rno as type_no, t.type as type_type, t.sno as type_species from pet_mypet p inner join pet_type t on p.type = t.sno inner join pet_species s on s.type = t.sno inner join pet_user m on m.mno=p.owner

select p.pno, p.pname, p.age, p.birth, p.gender, p.photo, t.type as type_type, m.name as owner_name from pet_species s inner join pet_type t on s.type = t.sno inner join pet_mypet p on p.type = t.rno inner join pet_user m on m.mno=p.owner where p.pno= #{no}
